summary: This API is designed to retrieve all restrictions related to inputting operating hours for the v2
description: This API is designed to retrieve all restrictions related to inputting operating hours for the v2.logistics.update_operating_hours function. This API ensures that user are aware of any limitations or conditions that may affect their operating hours.

query.name: regular_operating_hour
query.description: Details of Pickup Operating Hours / Preferred Pickup Hours: You can skip this parameter if you are not updating the Pickup Operating Hours / Preferred Pickup Hours

query.name: monday
query.description: Operating hours for Monday: You can skip this information if you want to mark the day as closed.

query.name: start_time
query.description: Start time for operating hours on that day: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.name: end_time
query.description: End time for operating hours on that day: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.name: tuesday
query.description: Operating hours for Tuesday: You can skip this information if you want to mark the day as closed.

query.name: start_time
query.description: Start time for operating hours on that day: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.name: end_time
query.description: End time for operating hours on that day: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.description: Operating hours for Wednesday: You can skip this information if you want to mark the day as closed.

query.description: Start time for operating hours on that day: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.description: End time for operating hours on that day: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.name: public_holiday
query.description: Operating hours for public holiday: You can skip this information if you want to mark the day as closed.

query.name: start_time
query.description: Start time for operating hours on that day: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.name: end_time
query.description: End time for operating hours on that day: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.name: special_operating_hour
query.description: Details of Special Operating Hours : You can skip this parameter if you are not creating Special Operating Hours or if you do not have access to create Special Operating Hours

query.name: name
query.description: The name of Special Operating Hours

query.name: start_date
query.description: The start date of the Special Operating Hours. The value should be within [today + 1] and [today + 365 days].

query.name: end_date
query.description: The end date of the Special Operating Hours. The value should be within [start_date + 30 days]

query.name: operating_hours
query.description: To specify the operating hours for each date

query.name: date
query.description: Date: it should be include all date from start_date until end_date

query.name: start_time
query.description: Start time for operating hours on that date: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.name: end_time
query.description: End time for operating hours on that date: The time should be in the format XX:YY, where YY is either 00 or 30.

query.name: enable
query.description: To specify this value as False if you're not operate on that date (close)

query.name: instant_operating_hour
query.description: Details of Special Operating Hours : You can skip this parameter if you are not creating/updating Instant Operating Hours or if you do not have access to create/update Instant Operating Hours

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/update_operating_hours?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "instant_operating_hour": {
        "friday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "monday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "public_holiday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "saturday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "sunday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "thrusday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "tuesday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "wednesday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        }
    },
    "regular_operating_hour": {
        "friday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "monday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "public_holiday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "saturday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "sunday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "thrusday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "tuesday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        },
        "wednesday": {
            "end_time": "18:30",
            "start_time": "09:00"
        }
    },
    "special_operating_hour": {
        "end_date": "2025-03-05",
        "name": "3.3 Campaign",
        "operating_hours": [
            {
                "date": "2025-03-03",
                "enable": true,
                "end_time": "23:30",
                "start_time": "00:00"
            }
        ],
        "start_date": "2025-03-03"
    }
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;
